definition: To obtain or achieve something through effort, skill, or perseverance, often referring to acquiring knowledge, skills, or a particular status. It is commonly used in the context of personal development, academic pursuits, or professional advancement.

examples.english: I want to obtain more information.

examples.german: Sie konnte keine Erlangung der Genehmigung erreichen.
examples.english: She was unable to obtain the approval.

examples.german: Er hat einen hohen akademischen Grad erlangt.
examples.english: He has achieved a high academic degree.

examples.german: Die Firma konnte einen großen Marktanteil erlangen.
examples.english: The company was able to gain a large market share.

examples.german: Die Mannschaft hat den Sieg erlangt.
